entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023
